name: Lord Dominik's Regards
simpleDescription: Overcomes enemies with high health and armor

passives.name: Giant Slayer
passives.effects: Deal {{pp|0 to 15 for 16|0 to 1500|key=%|type=target's '''bonus''' health|formula=1% per 100 bonus health, up to a maximum of 15% at 1500 bonus health.|color=health}} increased damage against enemy champions.
